meta.title: Albuquerque School of Excellence - New Mexico Public Education Department granted charter school.

meta.name: description
meta.content: An "A" rated New Mexico Public Education Department granted charter school. Albuquerque School of Excellence is now accepting applications for K through 12 for the 2020-2021 school year. ASE is a tuition-free chareter school with an emphasis of science, technology, engineering, arts, and math.
Albuquerque School of Excellence - New Mexico Public Education Department granted charter school.

An "A" rated New Mexico Public Education Department granted charter school. Albuquerque School of Excellence is now accepting applications for K through 12 for the 2020-2021 school year. ASE is a tuition-free chareter school with an emphasis of science, technology, engineering, arts, and math.

span.b: Please see the section ONLINE EDUCATION for links to online learning platforms.

br.br:
Please follow Ms. Barren's website for instructions, art project ideas, and assignments. Email lb101@abqse.org with any questions/concerns. Next assignment due Monday 5/4!
Grades 3 through 7: PHYSICAL EDUCATION
Please follow Ms. Meetze's website for week by week lessons to correspond with online instruction. Activity logs are due each week. Next activity log is due Monday 5/4! Please email mm101@abqse.org with any questions/concerns.
Further resources:
Internet services: If you do not have internet service at home, click HERE for helpful resources. The City of Albuquerque is providing dozens of "hot spots" throughout the city to reach as many homes as possible - HOT SPOTS
if your family is in need of resources during this time, please visit www.newmexico.gov or call the respective numbers provided by our state for further information/guidance:
1-855-600-3453 All health related information, COVID-19 testing & health questions.
1-833-551-0518 All other information including food, supplies, & childcare.
ASE strongly emphasizes to our community take the health precautions outlined by our government leaders seriously. Please understand and implement these policies into a genuine practice of social isolation and safe health practices.
Thank you all for your understanding, patience, support, and cooperation.
Please be safe and stay well!

div.h2: Education must be "one-on-one and individualized for the student."

div.div: College acceptance rate among graduating Albuquerque School of Excellence seniors.
Graduation rate among Albuquerque seniors exceeds the national average of 84 percent.
Alumni who are the first in their family to attend college doubles the national average.
